thread.title: Comcast tries to hook college cord cutters with campus TV deal
thread.title_full: Comcast tries to hook college cord cutters with campus TV deal - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Benny Evangelista
title: Comcast tries to hook college cord cutters with campus TV deal
text:
Photo: Elise Amendola, AP print_article_embed|photo-1896657|article-6491875|7 comments_jump_embed|photo-1896657|article-6491875|1 email_share_embed|photo-1896657|article-6491875|1 facebook_share_embed|photo-1896657|article-6491875|2 twitter_share_embed|photo-1896657|article-6491875|3 pinterest_share_embed|photo-1896657|article-6491875|4 reddit_share_embed|photo-1896657|article-6491875|5 google_share_embed|photo-1896657|article-6491875|6 With its new service, Comcast is trying to reach younger viewers who are most likely to cut all ties with any pay TV service when they graduate. With its new service, Comcast is trying to reach younger viewers...
Comcast said Tuesday it is expanding an online TV subscription service for college students as the cable TV giant tries to stem the rising tide of cord cutters among young viewers. With its new service, Comcast is trying to reach younger viewers who are most likely to cut all ties with any pay TV service when they graduate. With its new service, Comcast is trying to reach younger viewers...
Comcast said Tuesday it is expanding an online TV subscription service for college students as the cable TV giant tries to stem the rising tide of cord cutters among young viewers.
